title: Crab Roe Noodles
description: Luxurious noodles topped with rich, savory crab roe and meat, a delicacy often found in eastern China.

title: Hotpot
description: A communal dining experience where ingredients are cooked in a simmering pot of flavorful broth at the table.

title: Mapo Tofu
description: A popular Sichuan dish featuring soft tofu set in a spicy, oily sauce, often with minced meat.

title: Peking Duck
description: A famous Beijing dish prized for its thin, crispy skin, served with pancakes, scallions, and sweet bean sauce.

title: Roujiamo
description: Often called a 'Chinese hamburger,' this street food features stewed meat stuffed inside a flatbread bun.

title: Xiaolongbao
description: Delicate soup dumplings from Shanghai, filled with pork and a savory broth, steamed in a bamboo basket.
